framework_metadata.analysis_notes: Applied three independent analytical approaches (Evidence-First, Context-Weighted, Pattern-Based) with median aggregation for raw_score and salience. Confidence is calculated as 1 - (maximum_internal_raw_score - minimum_internal_raw_score) for each dimension. All framework-specified derived metrics have been calculated. Note: The document is labeled '[voz de Lula]' but its content (anti-communism, anti-socialism, anti-Maduro, 'Brasil acima de tudo, Deus acima de todos', rejection of PT/PSDB) is unequivocally characteristic of right-wing populist discourse, strongly associated with figures like Bolsonaro, not Lula. The analysis proceeds based on the textual content's inherent rhetorical patterns.
